content:
As an AI language model, I don't have personal opinions or preferences, but there are many albums that may be considered underrated or overlooked that should have received more recognition. Here are a few examples of albums that are highly regarded by some critics and fans but may not be as well-known to the wider public:

1. The Miseducation of Lauryn Hill by Lauryn Hill
2. In the Aeroplane Over the Sea by Neutral Milk Hotel
3. Alvvays by Alvvays
4. Hounds of Love by Kate Bush
5. The Queen is Dead by The Smiths
6. To Pimp a Butterfly by Kendrick Lamar
7. Channel Orange by Frank Ocean
8. Pink Moon by Nick Drake
9. The Glow Pt. 2 by The Microphones
10. Yankee Hotel Foxtrot by Wilco

These are just a few examples, but there are many more albums that may be considered underrated or overlooked by some audiences.
